channel.title: Compiler Error - Please Help!
channel.description:
I am getting this error when i try to compile my RSPS Client.
client.java:5362: illegal start of expression private void buildChatAreaMenu(int j) ^ 1 error Press any key to continue...
Please help me i would really appreciate it.

        boolean flag = false;

            boolean flag1 = true;
        }
